0010110010101101 1001010010011100 1 -> sum: 1100000101001010, cout: 0

0011011000110001 0010101011011110 1 -> sum: 0110000100010000, cout: 0
0001001011010000 0001010110101110 0 -> sum: 0010100001111110, cout: 0
0001110110000111 1100001000001100 1 -> sum: 1101111110010100, cout: 0
1100000100010010 0111101101010101 1 -> sum: 0011110001101000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
